definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: New packers will petition as respondents and attempt to secure low tariffs.
sentences.chinese: 新加殼將請願書，應答者，爲了能夠保證低關稅。

sentences.english: They also signed a large petition calling for her release.
sentences.chinese: 他們還簽署了一份請願書要求釋放她。

sentences.english: At her table she had a petition related to a big Green Party-related cause.
sentences.chinese: 在她的桌子上有一份和綠黨運動相關的請願書。

sentences.english: Did you sign that round robin that was sent to the manager this week?
sentences.chinese: 你在這周送給經理的那封圓形簽名請願書上簽字了嗎？

sentences.english: US petition drive towards ratifying the Kyoto Protocol.
sentences.chinese: 推進美國簽署京都議定書的請願書。

sentences.english: Add your voice to the campaign now – click here to sign the petition
sentences.chinese: 現在聲援這個運動，點擊這裏籤請願書。

sentences.english: These names will all be added to the petition.
sentences.chinese: 這些名字都將被添加到請願書中。

sentences.english: A commission spokesman said the petition would be considered next year.
sentences.chinese: 委員會的一個發言人說請願書明年將予考慮。

sentences.english: It was sent to the court, accompanied by a memorial of felicitation to the throne.7
sentences.chinese: 連同一封恭賀登基的請願書，它被送往朝廷。

sentences.english: The best thing I can do will be to certify the truth of the contents of your petition.
sentences.chinese: 證明您的請願書內容屬實，這是我很樂意做的事。

sentences.english: So far, the petition has about 4000 signatures.
sentences.chinese: 目前，在請願書上簽名的支持者已達到4000人。

sentences.english: They presented a petition to the authorities.
sentences.chinese: 他們向當局遞呈請願書。

sentences.english: Other critics saye-petitions are a false form of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 其他批評人士說，電子請願書是虛假的民主形式。

sentences.english: Bergeron says they are also planning to launch a petition.
sentences.chinese: 貝熱龍說，他們還計劃推出一個請願書。
